about.title: About Me
about.description: I am an undergraduate computer science student from Bina Nusantara University interested in building clean, effecient, and scalable applications. I enjoy tackling challenges across the stack from frontend design to backend architecture while constantly improving

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I’m currently looking for an internship in a web development role. My inbox is always open. Whether you are interested in my profile, have a question or just want to say hi. Feel free to reach out.
